label: Perf Pract Student Works II
description: Performance laboratory involving the rehearsal and performance of student works under faculty supervision. 0.5 to 2 undergraduate hours. 0.5 to 2 graduate hours. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: 0.5 to 2 undergraduate hours. 0.5 to 2 graduate hours. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s). Restricted to students with Junior, Senior, or Graduate class standing.
classScheduleInformation: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
